desc: Chop garlic fast with The Garlic Chop! Simply twist the garlic chopper until desired consistency. Unlike a garlic mincer or garlic press, the garlic chopper reduces waste and easily scrapes ingredients onto dish. Dishwasher friendly.

layout.text: Chop and peel garlic, ginger, and more in no time, with no mess, no wasted garlic, and no hard to clean parts.
